MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH9 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:30pm. Our emergency response team have arrived at the Grange Loan substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:57pm on Monday, 04 January 2021
